page.title: 19FUTURE COMMUNITY PROVISION.
page.content: { Two sports centres}are already being constructed.One is near the adventure playground in{Kenton}run by a local committee who will try to meet the area's needs.It will provide,a hall, squash courts,a junior room and a creche.{Montagu swimming baths}is being converted into the other sports centre.It will cater for the public and for local schools,having an indoor sports hall with badminton,netball and volleyball courts and will retain the old spectator's gallery.A coffee lounge and room for the unemployed to meet and play darts,snooker etc. will also be included. Local people are also converting an empty block of flats in{Kenton}into a {community centre with craft workshops to teach people new skills in order to improve their job prospects.
